ai-pli-tv-kd18:9.1.1_0: At that time a monk who had been born as a brahmin did not want to rinse after defecating, thinking,

ai-pli-tv-kd18:10.2.1_0: At that time the monks from the group of six entered the restroom too hastily, pulled up their robe before entering, groaned while defecating, brushed their teeth while defecating, defecated outside the toilet, urinated outside the urinal, spat in the urinal, used coarse wiping sticks, threw the wiping sticks in the cesspit, left the restroom too hastily, came out with their robe still pulled up, made a chomping sound while rinsing, and they left water in the scoop for rinsing.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:10.2.2_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized Udāyī,

ai-pli-tv-kd18:10.2.9_0: “Well then, I will lay down the proper conduct in regard to restrooms.

ai-pli-tv-kd18:10.3.26_0: If the gateway is dirty, he should sweep it.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:10.3.27_0: If there is no water in the rinsing pot, he should fill it.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:10.3.28_0: This is the proper conduct in regard to restrooms.”
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.1.1_0: On a later occasion the students did not conduct themselves properly toward their preceptors.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.1.2_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized Udāyī,
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.1.3_0: “How can students not conduct themselves properly toward their preceptors?”
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.1.4_0: They then told the Buddha. Soon afterwards he had the Sangha gathered and questioned them:
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.1.5_0: “Is it true, monks, that students are acting like this?”
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.1.8_0: “... How can students not conduct themselves properly toward their preceptors?
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.1.9_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.1.11_0: he gave a teaching and addressed the monks:
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.1.12_0: “Well then, I will lay down the proper conduct for preceptors toward their students.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.2.1_0: A student should conduct himself properly toward his preceptor.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.2.3_0: After getting up at the appropriate time, the pupil should take off his sandals, and put his upper robe over one shoulder. He should then give his teacher a toothbrush and water for rinsing the mouth, and he should prepare a seat for him.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.2.4_0: If there is rice porridge, he should wash a vessel and bring the rice porridge to his preceptor.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.2.5_0: When the preceptor has drunk the rice porridge, the student should give him water and receive the vessel, and holding it low, he should wash it carefully without scratching it and then put it away.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.2.6_0: When the preceptor has gotten up, the student should put away the seat.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.2.7_0: If the place is dirty, he should sweep it.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.3.1_0: If the preceptor wants to enter the village, the student should give him a sarong and receive the one he’s wearing in return. He should give him a belt. He should put the upper robes together, overlapping each other edge-to-edge, and then give them to him. He should wash his preceptor’s bowl and then give it to him while wet.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.3.2_0: If the preceptor wants an attendant, the student should put on his sarong evenly all around, covering the navel and the knees. He should put on a belt. Putting the other upper together, overlapping each other edge-to-edge, he should put them on and fasten the toggle. After washing his bowl, he should take it with him and be his preceptor’s attendant.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.3.3_0: He shouldn’t walk too far behind his preceptor or too close to him. He should receive the contents of his bowl.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.4.1_0: He shouldn’t interrupt his preceptor when he’s speaking.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.4.2_0: But if the preceptor’s speech is bordering on an offense, he should stop him.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.4.3_0: When returning, the pupil should go first to prepare a seat and to set out a foot-stool, a foot-scraper, and water for washing the feet. He should go out to meet the teacher to receive his bowl and robe. He should give him a sarong and receive the one he’s wearing in return.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.4.4_0: If the robe is moist, he should sun it for a short while, but he shouldn’t leave it in the heat.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.4.6_0: offsetting the edges by seven centimeters,
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.4.7_0: so that the fold doesn’t become worn.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.4.8_0: He should place the belt in the fold.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.4.9_0: If there is almsfood and his preceptor wants to eat, the student should give him water and then the almsfood.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.5.1_0: He should ask his preceptor if he wants water to drink.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.5.2_0: When the preceptor has eaten, the student should give him water and receive the bowl, and holding it low, he should wash it carefully without scratching it. He should then dry it and sun it for a short while,
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.5.3_0: but he shouldn’t leave it in the heat.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.5.4_0: He should put away the bowl and robe.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.5.5_0: When putting away the bowl, he should hold the bowl in one hand, feel under the bed or the bench with the other, and then put it away.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.5.6_0: he should not put his bowl on the ground evenly on the ground.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.5.7_0: After taking hold of the robe-cloth with one hand and then puts it on the edge of the robe within arm’s reach of the other, he should put it on one side in an expulsion.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.5.8_0: When the preceptor has gotten up, the student should put away the seat and also the foot-stool, the foot-scraper, and the water for washing the feet.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.5.9_0: If the place is dirty, he should sweep it.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.6.1_0: “If the preceptor wants to bathe, the student should prepare a bath.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.6.2_0: If he needs cold, he should prepare cold.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.6.3_0: if he wants a hot bath, he should prepare that.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.6.4_0: If the preceptor wants to use the sauna, the student should knead bath powder, moisten the clay, take the sauna stool, and follow behind his preceptor. After giving the preceptor the sauna stool, receiving his robe, and putting it aside, he should give him the bath powder and the clay.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.6.5_0: If he’s able, he should enter the sauna.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.6.6_0: When entering the sauna, he should smear his face with clay, cover himself in front and behind, and then enter the sauna.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.7.1_0: He shouldn’t sit encroaching on the senior monks,
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.7.2_0: and he shouldn’t block the junior monks from getting a seat.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.7.3_0: While in the sauna, he should do services for his preceptor.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.7.4_0: When leaving the sauna, he should take the sauna stool, cover himself in front and behind, and then leave the sauna.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.7.5_0: He should also do services for his preceptor in the water.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.7.6_0: When he has bathed, he should be the first to come out of the water. He should dry himself and put on his sarong. He should then wipe the water off his preceptor’s body, and he should give him his sarong and then his upper robe. Taking the sauna stool, he should be the first to return. He should prepare a seat, as well as set out a foot-stool, a foot-scraper, and water for washing the feet.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.7.7_0: He should ask his preceptor if he wants water to drink.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.8.1_0: If the teacher wants him to recite, he should do so.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.8.2_0: If the preceptor wants to question him, he should be questioned.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.8.3_0: “If the dwelling where the preceptor is staying is dirty, the student should clean it if he’s able.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.8.4_0: When he is cleaning the dwelling, he should first take out the bowl and robe and put them aside.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.8.5_0: He should take out the sitting mat and the sheet and put them aside.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.8.6_0: He should take out the mattress and the pillow and put them aside.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.9.1_0: Holding the bed low, he should carefully take it out without scratching it or knocking it against the door or the door frame, and he should put it aside.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.9.2_0: Holding the bench low, he should carefully take it out without scratching it or knocking it against the door or the door frame, and he should put it aside.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.9.3_0: He should take out the bed supports and put them aside.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.9.4_0: He should take out the spit and put it aside.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.9.5_0: He should take out the leaning board and put it aside.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.9.6_0: After taking note of where it’s placed, he should take out the floor cover and put it aside.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.9.7_0: If the dwelling has cobwebs, he should first remove them from the ceiling cloth, and he should then wipe the windows and the corners of the room.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.9.8_0: If the walls have been treated with red ocher and they’re moldy, he should moisten a cloth, wring it out, and wipe the walls.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.9.9_0: If the floor has been treated with black and it’s moldy, he should moisten a cloth, wring it out, and wipe the floor.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.9.10_0: If the floor is untreated, he should sprinkle it with water and then sweep it,
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.9.11_0: while trying to avoid stirring up dust.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.9.12_0: He should look out for any trash and discard it.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.10.1_0: He should sun the floor cover, clean it, beat it, bring it back inside, and put it back in the same place as before.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.10.2_0: He should sun the bed supports, wipe them, bring them back inside, and place them in the same position as before.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.10.3_0: He should sun the bed, clean it, and beat it. Holding it low, he should carefully bring it back inside without scratching it or knocking it against the door or the door frame, and he should put it back in the same place as before.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.10.4_0: He should sun the bench, clean it, and beat it. Holding it low, he should carefully bring it back inside without scratching it or knocking it against the door or the door frame, and he should put it back in the same place as before.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.10.5_0: He should sun the mattress and the pillow, clean them, beat them, bring them back inside, and put them back the way they were.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.10.6_0: He should sun the sitting mat and the sheet, clean them, beat them, bring them back inside, and put them back the way they were.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.10.7_0: He should sun the spittoon, wipe it, bring it back inside, and put it back where it was.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.10.8_0: He should sun the leaning board, wipe it, bring it back inside, and put it back where it was.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.11.1_0: He should put away the bowl and robe.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.11.2_0: When putting away the bowl, he should hold the bowl in one hand, feel under the bed or the bench with the other, and then put it away.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.11.3_0: he should not put his bowl on the ground evenly on the ground.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.11.4_0: After taking hold of the robe-cloth with one hand and then puts it on the edge of the robe within arm’s reach of the other, he should put it on one side in an expulsion.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.12.1_0: If dusty winds are blowing from the east, he should close the windows on the eastern side.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.12.2_0: If dusty winds are blowing from the west, he should close the windows on the west.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.12.3_0: If dusty winds are blowing from the north, he should close the windows on the northern side.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.12.4_0: If dusty winds are blowing from the south, he should close the windows on the southern side.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.12.5_0: If the weather is cold, he should open the windows during the day and close them at night.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.12.6_0: If the weather is hot, he should close the windows during the day and open them at night.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.13.1_0: If the precincts are dirty, he should sweep them.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.13.2_0: If the gateway is dirty, he should sweep it.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.13.3_0: If the assembly hall is dirty, he should sweep it.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.13.4_0: If the water-boiling shed is dirty, he should sweep it.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.13.5_0: If the restroom is dirty, he should sweep it.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.13.6_0: If there is no water for drinking, he should set it out.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.13.7_0: If there is no water for washing, he should set it out.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.13.8_0: If there is no water in the rinsing pot, he should fill it.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.14.1_0: “If the preceptor becomes discontent, the student should send him away or have him sent away, or he should give him a teaching.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.14.2_0: If the preceptor becomes anxious, the student should dispel it or have it dispelled, or he should give him a teaching.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.14.3_0: If the preceptor has a wrong view, the student should make him give it up or get someone else to do it, or he should give him a teaching.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.15.1_0: If the preceptor has committed a heavy offense and deserves probation,
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.15.2_0: the student should try for the Sangha to get it done.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.15.3_0: If the preceptor has committed a heavy offense and deserves to be sent back to the beginning,
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.15.4_0: the student should try for the Sangha to get it done.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.15.5_0: If the preceptor has committed a heavy offense and deserves to be given the trial period,
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.15.6_0: the student should try for the Sangha to get it done.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.15.7_0: If the preceptor has committed a heavy offense and deserves rehabilitation,
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.15.8_0: the student should try for the Sangha to get it done.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.16.1_0: If the Sangha wants to do a legal procedure against his preceptor—whether a procedure of condemnation, demotion, banishment, reconciliation, or ejection—

ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.16.4_0: the student should help the preceptor conduct himself properly and suitably so as to deserve to be released, and try for the Sangha to lift that procedure.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.17.1_0: “If the preceptor’s robe needs washing, the student should do it himself,
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.17.2_0: he should make an effort or to have it done.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.17.3_0: If the preceptor needs a robe, the student should make one himself,
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.17.4_0: or he should make an effort to have one made.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.17.5_0: If the preceptor needs dye, the student should make it himself,
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.17.6_0: or he should make an effort to have it made.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.17.7_0: If the preceptor’s robe needs dyeing, the student should do it himself,
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.17.8_0: or he should make an effort to have it done.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.17.9_0: When he’s dyeing the robe, he should carefully and repeatedly turn it over, and he shouldn’t go away while it’s still dripping.
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.18.1_0: Without asking permission of his preceptor, he shouldn’t do any of the following: give away or receive a bowl;

ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.18.3_0: give away or receive a requisite;

ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.18.5_0: do work for anyone or have work done by anyone;
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.18.6_0: do a service for anyone or have a service done by anyone;
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.18.7_0: be the attendant monk for anyone or take anyone as his attendant monk;
ai-pli-tv-kd18:11.18.8_0: bring back almsfood for anyone or have almsfood brought back by anyone;
